description:
Pack it in, hydrate, pack it out. This bottle is made from plastic bottles diverted from landfills, with a wide mouth that’s great for adding ice cubes, swabbing out the insides, and opening in colder conditions.

  • Tritan™ Renew is made with 50% recycled plastic waste
  • Loop top allows clipping onto packs, and lets you flip your lid, without losing it
  • Standard 63mm threaded opening fits water filters and other accessories
name: MEC Retro Camp Nalgene Sustain Wide Mouth Bottle 1L
